opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: American Gi Forum of Texas v. Perry, Governor of Texas

opinion:
543 U.S. 941

AMERICAN GI FORUM OF TEXAS ET AL.
v.
PERRY, GOVERNOR OF TEXAS, ET AL.

No. 03-1396.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 18, 2004.

1

Appeals from D. C. E. D. Tex. Motion of appellant in No. 03-9644 for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Judgment vacated, and cases remanded for further consideration in light of Vieth v. Jubelirer, 541 U. S. 267 (2004). Reported below: 298 F. Supp. 2d 451.
